page.title: 09LUDLOW SCHOOLS 1
page.content: Two playgroups cater for children from 3-5 years; one at Friary hall,Lower Galdeford,another at the New street Methodist schoolroom.These are privately run with volunteer helpers and affiliated to the Playgroup association. A State-run Nursery class,attached to the Ludlow C of E infants school has 40 part-time pupils with one teacher and one nursery nurse. Two Infants schools cater for children of 5-7years.St. Lawrence C of E,Lower Galdeford has 59 pupils,3 teachers including Mrs S. Wilding and 5 ancillaries. Ludlow County Infant School,Sandpits Road, has 169 pupils, 8 teachers including headmistress Miss B. Mason and 15 ancillaries.
